mapper.select:
SELECT e.emp_no AS emp_no, e.emp_nm AS emp_nm, d.comm_nm AS emp_dept, p.comm_nm AS emp_posit, e.emp_eml_addr AS emp_eml_addr FROM kcgbd.e_employee AS e INNER JOIN kcgbd.e_common d ON e.emp_dept = d.comm_no INNER JOIN kcgbd.e_common p ON e.emp_posit = p.comm_no WHERE 1=1
AND e.emp_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{emp_no}, '%')
AND e.emp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{emp_nm}, '%')
AND d.comm_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{emp_dept}, '%')
AND p.comm_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{emp_posit}, '%')
ORDER BY e.emp_no DESC
LIMIT #{limit}::integer

SELECT e.emp_no AS emp_no, e.emp_nm AS emp_nm, d.comm_no AS emp_dept, p.comm_no AS emp_posit, d.comm_nm AS emp_dept_nm, p.comm_nm AS emp_posit_nm, TO_CHAR(e.emp_ecny_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS emp_ecny_dt, e.emp_mbl_telno AS emp_mbl_telno, e.emp_eml_addr AS emp_eml_addr FROM kcgbd.e_employee AS e JOIN kcgbd.e_common d ON e.emp_dept = d.comm_no JOIN kcgbd.e_common p ON e.emp_posit = p.comm_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kcgbd.e_employee (emp_no, emp_nm, emp_dept, emp_posit, emp_ecny_dt, emp_mbl_telno, emp_eml_addr) VALUES( #{emp_no}, #{emp_nm}, #{emp_dept}, #{emp_posit}, TO_DATE(#{emp_ecny_dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{emp_mbl_telno}, #{emp_eml_addr} )
mapper.update: UPDATE kcgbd.e_employee SET emp_nm = #{emp_nm}, emp_dept = #{emp_dept}, emp_posit = #{emp_posit}, emp_ecny_dt = TO_DATE(#{emp_ecny_dt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), emp_mbl_telno = #{emp_mbl_telno}, emp_eml_addr = #{emp_eml_addr} WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no}
